marklogic.body: Where in the bible does it say that for political Gain it is alright to play the race card and 'class politics' and turn a Cold, chilly shoulder on an entire state? Where in the bible does it say that our leaders should call us Nazi's and 'Astroturf' because they frighten and disturb us? Where in the bible does it condone a Presidents serial lying and clear attempts to censor the news? Where in the bible does it ever once mention 'Health Care' outside of our self-appointed Pope Nancy Pelosi's dillusional interpretations of the scriptures?
